price: 31. Liloba lia Nkolo wa biso lizali ya soló. Sólo tokomema. (etumbu)
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
